I'm fairly sure it's been done before, but I made a rocket powered roller coaster. It ends much the same way most coasters I make in games do though (the cart flies off), but it shouldn't be too hard to make it loop I think. The cart stays on the tracks pretty well, and it moves just fine.

Feel free to make your own tracks for it if you feel like it, no idea how you'd manage turns though. (Just post them here so I can see, and give credit if you post elsewhere please)

.craft: https://www.dropbox.com/s/pnktd3laxeengfc/POCRC.craft

Decided I wanted to turn, but ran into issues, thus the monorail was born.

It's slow, and jittery but it does the job.

.craft: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xys7273bxmiiq6o/POCRM%20v3.craft
